name: Toby Can Snowboard!
description:
Toby Can Snowboard!

This is a fun 2D side-scrolling snowboarding game I've made for my game development portfolio. For now, there is only one level although I may add a few more.

CONTROLS:

  • Hold W or Shift to speed up
  • Hold S to slow down
  • Press Space to jump
  • Hold A to spin left
  • Hold D to spin right

Collect coins and do full 360 spins to earn a high score! And most importantly... don't bang your head! Have fun!
